channel.title: Juliana Faccio Lima
channel.description: Recent content on Juliana Faccio Lima

item.title: Past Courses | Juliana Lima
item.description: As a graduate student, I had the opportunity to design my own Critical Thinking class. You’ll find the syllabus here. As a teaching assistant, I was known among students for offering handouts and worksheets for each of my discussion sections (most of the time, anyway). This encouraged students to take class notes, naturally directed their attention to the most important points of the reading, and helped them to study for exams or write their papers.

item.title: Syllabi | Juliana Lima
item.description: Over my academic career, I had the opportunity to observe many different courses and to get feedback from students. Here’s some sample syllabi of courses I’d like to teach. Note: I update my syllabi regularly. Double check to make sure you have the latest version! Intro to Ethics Philosophy of Language
